u.a: Eve sits on wooden car and turns wheel as Gus goes to ironing board .
Eve watches as he irons then goes to something on floor asking
Gus replies leaving iron and joining her .
Gus returns to iron and Eve moves to tool belt on floor .
Gus leaves iron again and discourages her from tool belt .
for the next 3 line(s): Eve continues , however , as Gus watches . Gus then gets on car .
is unclear . long pauses Eve leaves belt gets up , walks past car speaking as Gus watches her and makes soft driving noises .
for the next 1 line(s): Gus leaves car and goes to Eve by sofa .
Gus does not respond .
Eve goes to stove
interruption as new toys are brought in in suitcase . Gus joins her replying .
<2w> interruption
both look at suitcase and Gus reject's eve's previous proposal . common focus of attention is the suitcase .
Gus unzips it and Eve asks this .
Gus zips suitcase up again and Eve wanders off .
for the next 1 line(s): Gus stays by suitcase and Eve sits on sofa , goes to ironing board . Gus leaves suitcase , come toward Eve but she goes back to suitcase .
Gus doesn't reply to this
Eve sits by suitcase , unzips it and Gus watches .
for the next 2 line(s): Eve takes pocket book out and they discuss it softly without much interest .
Eve returns it to suitcase and reaches for straw hat
<aft> Eve almost puts hat on . for the next 5 line(s): common focus of attention is the hat while Gus watches
Gus doesn't really answer and wanders off .
unclear . Eve leaves hat and moves around stove .
for the next 1 line(s): no response to these .
for the next 1 line(s): Eve sits by car and turns wheel to which Gus comments .
as Eve gets on car , Gus remarks . she half watches him as he plays with toy cars and she turns wheel .
long pause after speaking .
Eve sees mirror and invites Gus .
he responds but doesn't look up
for the next 1 line(s): looks up
Eve looks in mirror as Gus watches , eventually smiles and moves toward her and mirror .
Eve directs gus's attention to microphone . he glances up , then back to mirror .
very pleased with this and gestures .
for the next 1 line(s): fainter .
Eve returns to iron .
Gus touches steering wheel of car at which Eve comments
Gus goes on to stove speaking to himself as he plays with oven .
after pause , Eve joins Gus at stove and speaks .
is not really a reply . both independent by stove .
at noise Eve gets up , and looks around .
<aft> noise
Eve wonders , speaks , and goes to box . <aft> Gus absorbed with stove .
Gus replies and watches her as she picks , up hat .
<aft> Eve puts on hat , goes to show it to gus
Gus replies and Eve returns to clothes box .
for the next 1 line(s): Gus continues to himself as Eve searches box .
Eve takes bali hat , looks at it .
returns to box , and speaks , putting fireman's hat on .
Gus replies .
Eve goes to stove and directs speech to gus
he responds .
for the next 1 line(s): Eve responds , walks around car as Gus watches , still handling dishes .
for the next 5 line(s): is desultory . Gus is by stove , Eve some distance away on other side of car , taking tool belt apart , no direct gaze .
Eve becomes silent while Gus conducts a monologue about his cooking . Eve glances at Gus and noise made by opening oven door . Gus sort of sings to himself .
